channel.title: Adding exp help
channel.description: What code should i add for woodcutting ect So when someone clicks the tree they get 1 log and exp .. but they require an axe..

item.title: Adding exp help
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

case 1276:
if(playerLevel[8] >= 1){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1351) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1349) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1353) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1355) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1357) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1359) {
setAnimation(875);
addItem(1511, 1);
addSkillXP(120000, 8);
}
}
else
{
sendMessage(“You need a woodcutting lvl of 1 to chop this.”);
}

Read full topic
